title: Bread_Tyrant Authorpage
content:

**Now Presenting...**

[[tabview]]
[[tab Author]]
Hello, I'm [[*user Bread_tyrant]]! And I like sci-fi/fantasy.

**Quotes:**
"What are you gonna do, quote me?" [[*user synthpanda_]]

"Good bread, would eat" [[*user felixou]]

**Name:** Clarence B. Tyrant

**Clearance:** 3

**Assigned Site:** Site-301

**Position:** Idk he's just sorta there.

[[/tab]]
[[tab Esoteric Classes]]
Please feel free to use the definitions or just the symbols for something else if you want :)

||~ Icon ||~ Esoteric class ||~ Description ||
|| [[image http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/dr-tyrant/Illusion_disruption_icon width="100px"]] || **Disruption Class:** Illusion || Disturbances are either perceived as veil breaking or mundane, however, are usually the opposite. ||
|| [[image http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/dr-tyrant/unclear_risk_icon width="100px"]] || **Risk Class:** Unclear || The risk the anomaly has to subjects is unclear. ||
|| [[image http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/dr-tyrant/Sekta_icon_svg width="100px"]] || **Containment Class:** SEKTA || Anomaly is either Safe, Euclid, Keter, Thaumiel or Appolyon. ||
|| [[image http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/dr-tyrant/shape_secondary_icon_2 width="100px"]] || **Containment Class:** Shape || Anomaly has a solid/fixed shape whether it is conceptual, physical or corporeal. ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/bread-tyrant-authorpage/confusion_icon width="100px"]] || **Containment Class:** Confusion || Anomaly is easily misinterpreted or misunderstood. ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/bread-tyrant-authorpage/infiltrate_icon width="100px"]] || **Containment Class:** Infiltrated || A secondary class for when an anomaly has breached Foundation security measures and is somewhere within it. ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/bread-tyrant-authorpage/stable_icon width="100px"]] || **Containment Class:** Stable || A secondary class for when an anomaly is dangerous, but is also classed as Safe. ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/bread-tyrant-authorpage/ontokinetic_icon width="100px"]] || **Containment Class:** Ontokinetic || A secondary class for anomalies that are Ontokinetic in nature. ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/bread-tyrant-authorpage/notsafe_icon width="100px"]] || **Containment Class:** Not Safe || The Anomaly does not have the containment class "Safe". ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/bread-tyrant-authorpage/Auplong width="100px"]] || **Containment Class:** Auplong || Containment of the anomaly affects the entire planet. ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/bread-tyrant-authorpage/azathoth_icon width="100px"]] || **Containment Class:** Azathoth || [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-4626 SCP-4626] ||
[[/tab]]
[[/tabview]]
